Description: As a new customer, I want to register for online banking so that I can access my accounts digitally and manage my finances online.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: User Registration
Scenario: New customer registers successfully
  Given a new user visits the registration page
  When they provide valid personal information
  And they create a strong password
  And they verify their email address
  Then their account should be created with pending status
  And they should receive welcome email
  And KYC verification should be initiated

Description: As a new customer, I want to upload my identity documents so that I can complete the KYC verification process and activate my account.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: KYC Document Upload
Scenario: Customer uploads identity documents
  Given customer has registered account
  When they upload valid government ID
  And they upload proof of address
  Then documents should be encrypted and stored securely
  And OCR should extract information automatically
  And compliance team should be notified for review
  And customer should see upload confirmation

Description: As a banking customer, I want to set up multi-factor authentication so that my account is protected with an additional security layer.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: MFA Setup
Scenario: Customer enables MFA
  Given customer is logged in
  When they navigate to security settings
  And they choose authenticator app method
  Then QR code should be displayed
  And customer scans code with authenticator app
  And customer enters verification code
  Then MFA should be enabled
  And backup codes should be generated

Description: As a mobile banking user, I want to use fingerprint or face recognition to log in so that I can access my account quickly and securely.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: Biometric Login
Scenario: Customer logs in with fingerprint
  Given customer has enrolled biometric authentication
  When they open mobile app
  And they place finger on sensor
  Then fingerprint should be verified locally
  And customer should be logged in
  And session should be created with 15-minute timeout

Description: As a banking customer, I want to view my account balance so that I can monitor my finances and available funds.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: View Account Balance
Scenario: Customer views current balance
  Given customer is logged into their account
  When they navigate to accounts page
  Then they should see all linked accounts
  And each account should display current balance
  And each account should show available vs pending balance
  And last transaction date should be visible

Description: As a banking customer, I want to view my transaction history so that I can track my spending and verify transactions.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: Transaction History
Scenario: Customer views recent transactions
  Given customer is viewing account details
  When they click on transaction history
  Then last 30 days of transactions should be displayed
  And transactions should show date, description, amount
  And transactions should be sorted by date (newest first)
  And customer can filter by date range, amount, type

Description: As a banking customer, I want to download my account statements so that I can keep records for tax purposes and personal finance management.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: Statement Download
Scenario: Customer downloads monthly statement
  Given customer is viewing account details
  When they select statement period (month/year)
  And they click download as PDF
  Then PDF statement should be generated
  And statement should include all transactions
  And statement should be password protected
  And download should complete within 10 seconds

Description: As a banking customer, I want to transfer money between my own accounts so that I can manage my finances efficiently.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: Internal Fund Transfer
Scenario: Transfer between own accounts
  Given customer has multiple accounts with sufficient balance
  When they select source and destination accounts
  And enter transfer amount
  And provide transfer description
  And confirm with MFA
  Then funds should be debited from source
  And funds should be credited to destination
  And confirmation should be sent via email/SMS
  And transaction should appear in history immediately

Description: As a banking customer, I want to transfer money to external bank accounts so that I can send money to others or my accounts at other banks.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: External Fund Transfer
Scenario: Transfer to external beneficiary
  Given customer has added verified beneficiary
  When they initiate external transfer
  And enter amount and reference
  And confirm with MFA
  Then AML check should be performed
  And transfer should be queued for processing
  And customer should receive estimated completion time
  And tracking number should be provided

Description: As a banking customer, I want to add and save beneficiary details so that I can easily send money to them in the future.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: Add Beneficiary
Scenario: Customer adds new beneficiary
  Given customer is on beneficiaries page
  When they enter beneficiary name
  And enter bank account details
  And verify account number by re-entering
  And provide nickname (optional)
  Then beneficiary should be saved
  And verification transfer may be initiated
  And beneficiary should appear in list

Description: As a banking customer, I want to schedule automatic recurring transfers so that I can automate regular payments like savings or loan repayments.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: Recurring Transfers
Scenario: Set up monthly recurring transfer
  Given customer is on transfer page
  When they enable recurring transfer option
  And select frequency (daily/weekly/monthly)
  And set start date and end date (optional)
  And specify amount and accounts
  Then recurring schedule should be created
  And customer should receive confirmation
  And first transfer should execute on start date

Description: As a banking customer, I want to pay my utility bills directly from the app so that I can manage all payments in one place.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: Bill Payment
Scenario: Pay utility bill
  Given customer is on bill payment page
  When they select biller from directory
  And enter account number with biller
  And enter payment amount
  And select payment date
  And confirm transaction
  Then payment should be scheduled
  And confirmation number should be provided
  And reminder should be set for payment date

Description: As the banking system, I need to detect suspicious transactions in real-time so that I can prevent fraudulent activities and protect customers.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: Fraud Detection
Scenario: Detect suspicious transaction
  Given fraud detection engine is monitoring transactions
  When transaction is attempted from unusual location
  And amount is higher than customer's pattern
  Then transaction should be temporarily held
  And customer should receive immediate SMS alert
  And customer must verify transaction to proceed
  And security team should be notified if not verified

Description: As a banking customer, I want to receive instant alerts for all transactions so that I can detect unauthorized activity immediately.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: Transaction Alerts
Scenario: Receive transaction alert
  Given customer has enabled transaction alerts
  When a debit transaction occurs on their account
  Then customer should receive SMS within 30 seconds
  And customer should receive push notification
  And alert should include amount, merchant, time
  And option to report as fraud should be available

Description: As a banking customer, I want to chat with support agent in the app so that I can get help without making a phone call.
Acceptance Criteria:
Feature: In-App Chat
Scenario: Customer initiates chat with support
  Given customer is logged into app
  When they click on help icon
  And select 'Chat with Agent'
  Then chat window should open
  And customer should be connected to available agent
  And chat history should be saved
  And customer can attach screenshots
  And satisfaction survey shown after chat ends
